items.sentence: If I had bought the painting then, I would be rich now.
If I were in your situation, I would do the same thing.
You don\'t have to stop reading just because I\'m here.
You don\'t have to talk about it if you don\'t want to.
Did the newspaper article say how fast Tom was driving?
Did you actually see Tom do what the police say he did?
Did you know there are three other Toms at this school?
Did you receive a Christmas present from Tom this year?
How dangerous do you think this mission is going to be?
Tom was the only one without enough money for the trip.
